name: Typist
description:
Typist is a typography tool that lets you create beautiful modular typography scales base on musical notes or any magical number (Golden Ratio).
 ---------------------------- 
 * WHY CHOOSE TYPIST? 
 - Typist Got You! Typist is for everyone designers and developers.
 - Reusable type settings to start designing fast. 
 - Typist does all the magic calculations behind the scenes so you can start designing fast. 
 - Typist doesn't style your typography color, font style or chooses your typeface. 
 - User friendly & Customizable.
 - Typist is AWESOME! 
 FEATURE REQUEST.
 ---------------------------- 
 ** FEATURES 
 - Modular typography scales 
 - Optimal Line Length. 
 - Nice and neat typographic results. 
 - User friendly & Customizable.
